com.chuchro.craps
Class Bet

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.craps.Bet

abstract class Bet
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class is the super class of all Bet objects; each will extend Bet, or another bet object that extends Bet (ad infinitum)

Author:
Doug Chuchro (doug@chuchro.net)

Nested Class Summary
static class Bet.BetStatus
          Enumerates the different states a bet can be in at any given time.
 
Field Summary
 int amount
          Amount of the bet
 int amountMultiple
          Some bets can only be a multiple of a certain number for the odds payout to not be fractional therefore the house stipulates that the bet must be a multiple of a certain amount (1=no multiple requirement)
 java.lang.String betName
          Name of the bet, ex: "Pass Line bet", "Come line bet", "Field bet"
 Bet.BetStatus betStatus
          Current status of this bet, based on BetStatus enumeration defined below
 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> losers
          All the rolls that lose this bet
 int maxAmount
          Maximum amount of bet
 int minAmount
          Minimum amount of bet
 java.lang.Double payoutRatio
          Expressed as x/y, how much the house pays ($x) for every $y bet, ex: 6/5 pays $6 on a $5 bet
 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> winners
          All the rolls that win this bet

Method Detail

promptBetAmount

private int promptBetAmount()

getOddsBetString

public java.lang.String getOddsBetString()
Empty method to print the Odds bet attached to this bet. Called by Session.printBetSumamry() which iterates over all bet so it must be present in this super object. Subclass LineBet will override this method to actually print out info about the Odds bet.
